abstract: Georgia Judge J Kevin Chason reduces $150 million award to family of Remington Walden, 4-year-old boy killed following car crash that caused 1999 Jeep Grand Cherokee to burst into flames; family will now receive $40 million.
lead_paragraph: A judge has reduced a $150 million award to $40 million for the family of a 4-year-old boy killed in a 1999 Jeep Grand Cherokee.

headline.main: Judge Cuts Award to Family of Boy Killed in Jeep Crash
headline.print_headline: Judge Cuts Award to Family of Boy Killed in Jeep Crash

snippet: A judge has reduced a $150 million award to $40 million for the family of a 4-year-old boy killed in a 1999 Jeep Grand Cherokee.
